name: B.E.R.N.A.R.D.'s Fun House
description:
you are one of many candidates for B.E.R.N.A.R.D.'s tests and you must prove your worth to him. you have the ability to stop time to solve tests. there is one Easter egg in the game (on the last normal test) and some sequences can be broken by stopping time (I think)

Controls: standard fps stuff WASD and Space to move E to interact and all that

This game was an idea I just had one day and I also just wanted to make a project and finish it without caring about quality so it was like a game jam game to me. because of this I did not go through a lot of testing and thus the game is buggy and has some audio sync issues in the final scene. the game has sub titles up until the final scene, sorry about that. it was either forget the game forever or share what I had done.
